title: She Wants to Break Her Engagement! - Novel Updates
tags: Broken Engagement   Female Protagonist   Money Grubber   Oneshot   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Amemiya Ame   雨宮あめ
description:
'Canan, I'm breaking off my engagement with you.'

My fiancé's words made me rejoice!

Thank you. Thank you!

Thank you very much, God!




This is a story about a money-hungry Heroine who wants to break off her engagement.

It's a casual, easy-going engagement break-up.>
